Crafting

From Peragro Tempus Wiki

Wiki Home

Item Creation Process: Crafting · Design · Fabrication · Materials · Production
Design Types: Tools · Clothing and Jewelery · Containers


The second skill-based part of the economy, crafting skills take one material or item and convert it to another, generally more useful, item. The "raw materials" for crafting skills are usually obtained through a production skill, though a few other events will yield them.

Craft skills include;

  • Tailor
  • Blacksmith
  • Carpenter
  • Cook
  • Herbalist
  • Mason


Contents

  • 1 Making Items
  • 2 Materials
  • 3 Designs
    • 3.1 Creating New Designs
  • 4 Repair

Making Items

Using a craft skill to fabricate an item requires the character possess a design (sometimes called a recipe), possess the necessary materials for that design, and succeed at a set of skill checks with a penalty determined by the design.

Any time a new item is created the items which went into its creation are recorded as part of its data. While this information may not be accessble to most, a character with sufficient skill in the appropriate crafting skill can see what the original materials were from which an item was manufactured- even if they went through several intermediate steps.


Materials

Materials are the raw components that are created through production skills and used to fulfill the requirements of a design to fabricate finished products.

The properties of materials vary due to a number of effects, including their source and type. For example, the statistics of a rock are vastly different than those of an animal hide. Even the leather produced from two different animals can be wildly different in its effects- especially when used for Magic.

Designs

A key component of crafting an item is its Design. Some craftsmen preferr to create designs, the patterns with which other crafters will create goods, while others preferr to use designs to make new objects. The ability to manufacture goods of your own Design is generally regarded as the mark of a talented craftsman.

Creating New Designs

To create a new design the character must open the Crafting window, when they enter a type of available design a button will appear near the bottom which reads "Create New Design." By clicking on this option, they will open a "New Design" window.

Repair

Generally crafting skills are also used to repair the items they create- restoring Quality (their % effectiveness) at the cost of the item's durability. (possibly restoring durability at cost of other attributes?)
